name: King's Guard: Archer Defense (Pre-Alpha)
description:
King's Guard: Archer Defense is a 2D tower defense/action hybrid from the top-down (3/4) perspective. Your job is to protect the king.

KG:AD is a browser game written in JavaScript, and is best used with Google Chrome.

To play, visit this link: https://likadev.github.io/kings-guard-archer-defen...

Development blog: http://likadev.tumblr.com

Submit feedback: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1KlL7nlgJIcw5YPPBL...

Thanks for playing.
